schema.description: Create a Expo Component for Nx.

examples.description: Generate a component with the exported symbol matching the file name. It results in the component `Foo` at `mylib/src/foo.tsx`
Generate a component with the exported symbol different from the file name. It results in the component `Custom` at `mylib/src/foo.tsx`
Generate a component without the providing the file extension. It results in the component `Foo` at `mylib/src/foo.tsx`

path.description: The file path to the component. Relative to the current working directory.
path.x-prompt: What is the component file path?

name.description: The component symbol name. Defaults to the last segment of the file path.

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.
js.x-deprecated: Provide the full file path including the file extension in the `path` option. This option will be removed in Nx v21.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.

export.description: When true, the component is exported from the project index.ts (if it exists).
export.x-prompt: Should this component be exported in the project?

classComponent.description: Use class components instead of functional component.
